name: The Gardener (jmajo001)
description:
The Gardener is a First Person Shooter in which the player takes the role of a gardener on clean up duty.

Armed with a leaf blower the player must remove all of the leaves from the tree that are ready to fall. Make sure to catch them before they hit the ground if you want to earn your coin for the day! Traverse the garden and collect all of the leaves.

 

Controls

WASD – Move Around

Mouse – Look around

Left Click – Fire (The mouse cursor is where you are aiming)

Q – Activate Platform (Used On Grey Pillars)
